title: Monitor SCADA System for Cybersecurity Threats
description: A cybersecurity analyst is monitoring the network traffic of a power plant's SCADA system for anomalies that could indicate a cyber attack.

tasks.description: Monitor network logs and firewall activity in real-time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's monitoring tool flags an unusual number of failed login attempts from an unrecognized IP address.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the suspicious IP address with a threat intelligence database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the IP address is associated with known malicious actors.

tasks.description: Immediately block the malicious IP address at the firewall.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the firewall rule.

tasks.description: Initiate a security incident response protocol and document the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal incident report.
